abstract: The recall of one of its best-selling contact lens solutions has put Advanced Medical Optics into crisis mode.
snippet: The recall of one of its best-selling contact lens solutions has put Advanced Medical Optics into crisis mode.
lead_paragraph: On Thursday, James V. Mazzo, the chief executive of Advanced Medical Optics, appeared to be a step closer to his goal of offering a full suite of products in the eye care market, as his company weighed a takeover bid for its significantly bigger rival Bausch & Lomb.

headline.main: Recall Slows Company’s Plan to Grow in Eye Care
headline.print_headline: Recall Slows Company’s Plan to Grow In Eye Care
